name: Dulce Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Warm & Sweet Gourmands.Key Notes:Vanilla, Chocolate, Hinoki Wood.Fragrance Description:This eau de parfum is like a decadent and rich dive into the world of vanilla. It is instantly recognizable and undeniably addictive. This scent has a blend of two kinds of vanilla, a touch of chocolate and seductive Hinoki wood. This fragrance is like sweet candy with a shot of whisky on the side..About the Fragrance:This fragrance is inspired by good times, innocence, and the sweeter things in life.
ingredients: Organic Sugar Cane Alcohol, Organic Caprylic / Capric Triglycerides, Dioctyl Adipate, Dipropylene Glycol, Vanillin, Methyl Hydrogenated Rosinate, Ethyl Vanillin, 4-Tert-Butylcyclohexyl Acetate, Octahydrocoumarin, Myroxylon Pereira (Balsam Peru) Oil, Ethyl Hydroxypyrone, Gamma-Nonalactone, Ethoxy-P-Cresol, Butyl Butyrolactate, Anisaldehyde, Ambrettolide, Iso E Super, Ethylene Brassylate, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Cinnamate, Coumarin...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spritz all over. .-Avoid rubbing or dabbing as this breaks down the fragrance. .-Applying to well moisturized skin helps extend fragrance....We work hard, so you donu2019t have too!  ALL by Rosie Jane packaging is recyclable..How to be a cool human:.- Remove pump and sprayer from our bottles, rinse and throw into your home recycle bin..- Our boxes too!!.- You can return the sprayer and pumps back to By Rosie Jane and we will recycle them for you and also give you a little gift in return

shades.shade_name: 1.7 oz / 50 mL Eau de Parfum Spray eau de parfum spray

reviews.review_text: Vanilla based fragrances are my favorite scents. There is a popular nice fragrance that I adore but, sometimes, it's a bit too heavy and sweet. I bought the travel size and have already used half of it quickly, so I took advantage of the 20% off full-size fragrances to purchase a full bottle. reviews.review_title: And Folks, We Have a WINNER!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair
reviews.review_text: A clean frag vanilla winner that is.  This vanilla is WAY better than Phlur's, Commodity's, all of Henry Rose's vanillas (those are runner ups).  Rosie got this right.  This smells AMAZING.  To me, it smells like a fireplace lit room with hot chocolate and caramel chocolate mousse pie. Not cloying.  NOT artificially as some reviews state.  Def not cheap.  A vanilla candle couldn't smell this good.  This one is really, really well concocted.  If you are into gourmands, you should try this.  Atypical, warm and sensual. Fragrances fall into 3 price cats: Cheap - Don't do this ladies.  Just don't. Medium - What most these are.  When you buy frags in this price range, you need to search for the best.  Sometimes, the best will surprise you.  Sis, I wasn't even going to try this one. Expensive - Be careful.  Not all high dollar perfumes are good.  Some are amazing, but have sketch ingredients.

reviews.review_title: Smells exactly like a sweet waffle coneud83cudf66
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been waiting for months for Dulce to restock on the Sephora app! When it finally did I wasted no time and purchased it immediately. I must say upon initial spray it was rather disappointing and almost smelled skin like? I got no vanilla cone or chocolate everyone had been raving about? After waiting a couple minutes the dry down was so delicious and I absolutely understand the hype now! I get the chocolate note which I feel mostly shines through in this perfume as well as the waffle coney vanilla and after several hours it dries down even more deliciousud83cudf66. The projection is quite good as I catch whiffs of it throughout the day, I would also say the longevity is about 5-6 hours until it fully settles into the skin. My boyfriend said I smell like candy and he isn't one to compliment perfumes so I'd say that's a great thing! I'll definitely be purchasing again!

I just hoped that I loved it because I bought this not knowing how it smelt and I don't like returning items. this perfume smells good, I wish it had a little bit of a stronger scent but overall I am pleased with it. (I'm not the best at describing perfumes I'm aware that I'm horrible at it ud83dude05 don't hold it against me haha) but it smells exactly like you'd expect,  it's a very light chocolately scent , I hope it comes back in stock again soon and hopefully even in a perfume gift set like it did before and I wish I was able to get my hands on that perfume set ud83dude1e

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume but I had to write review bc this one grew on meu2026 I orginally sprayed this one on a tester strip and thought it was a bit too synthetic smelling and did not know if it was unique enough to buy. After a few months of still searching for a signature scent I kept seeing reviews on this one pop up, and I decided I had to go back and spray it on my skinu2026 and oh my word. So much better! Should have done this in the first place seeing as this is how you tell if your body chemistry mixes well with any perfume. Now I am obsessed. I wish it was a little bit stronger, but it is still present and longevity on me is pretty great. So I definitely recommend for a intriguing vanilla with a hint of woodsy/musk and a even lighter hint of chocolate that makes this super unique in my opinion.

reviews.review_text: I can't quite make up my mind about this one. I wanted to love it. The reviews for this are almost all favorable so I blind bought it. Melted vanilla ice cream, as everyone describes it, is right up my alley. I thought this would be perfect for me. But...meh.   I will be showing my age here, but this perfume smells exactly like Coty Vanilla Fields from the 90s. Pretty much dead on. I saw someone else put that in a review as well so I know its not just me. When I first put this on it has a sharp note to it. On the dry down I don't get any vanilla at all. I pretty much just get baby powder. Lasting power is mediocre on me, sillage is medium. I don't hate it. I just don't get much vanilla or sweet out of it.  I will use it to layer with other things to help take away the sharpness but I probably won't repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love gourmand perfumes so when Dulce came out, I immediately blind-bought a full size bottle. Now, I don't know how people are getting baked goods out of this. I was hoping for chocolate cake and vanilla frosting as promised but neither I, nor anyone around me, are getting baked goods vibes.   Dulce opens with delicate woody spiciness. It's warm and there's some gentle sweetness to it. But the opening does not give me delicious dessert. The woodiness remains as the perfume develops into vanilla extract spilled a couple feet away. It's very distant and almost immediately becomes a skin scent. Chocolate is there as a background role. It's Tree #6 in a school play. If I didn't know it was one of the notes, I would've assumed the perfume just has some musk in there.   It's not a projecting perfume. Most people can't smell it on me unless their nose is like right up to my skin. And I stop smelling it after a couple hours.   As a skin scent, this is fine. I just wish I was more prepared to smell like a tree stump and less like a vanilla cupcake.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells clean but also smells exactly like vanilla frosting! My mom asked me if I was wearing like a vanilla extract so this perfume definitely smells like you smeared some vanilla on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay so I was really excited to get this perfume it definitely has a sweet scent to it and definitely has a spiciness to it almost like a cinnamon scent and I think itu2019s a decent fragrance but the more I wear it the more Iu2019m getting a cough syrup/medicine scent that I canu2019t get over.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is so delicious. I'm a vanilla perfume lover and always hear people rave about Vanilla 28 by Kay Ali. This, however, is better, in my opinion. Vanilla 28 is more powerful and has a spice to it, whereas this is a perfect, non-offensive daytime vanilla. The reviews are super accurate, to me it smells like melted vanilla bean ice cream. It's very sweet and strong at first, but the dry down is warm, cozy and truly delicious vanilla. Can't stop smelling my wrists! Safe blind buy in my opinion, but try it first!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells SO good. It literally smells like vanilla ice cream! Itu2019s pretty light sadly. it lasts very long on my clothes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite vanilla. Lasts 6-8 hours on me. if you want to smell like baked vanilla cake with chocolate drizzle on top look no further.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, so to me this smells like a (more cost effective) dupe of KAYALIu2019s VANILLA | 28. I also find this scent lingers longer on my skin than KAYALIu2019s! I 100% recommend this if you are a vanilla fan, and itu2019s also great for layering!

reviews.review_title: Literally so goodu2014let me put you on it!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I layer this on top of Sol de Janeiro 71 and it adds a perfect chocolatey-vanilla note on top of the vanilla dry down of 71. I wear this every time I go out!! Love that itu2019s a spray travel size and not rollerball too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this perfume. It smells like melted vanilla bean ice cream, and vanilla extract.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who likes sweeter scents, especially vanilla, this one, for me, is perfect in the summer. Itu2019s very sweet at first but once it settles in, it has a much lighter sweetness to it, especially in the summer. At first you might feel like you smell like baked goods and vanilla extract but it settles very nicely. I receive so many compliments on it. My friends and my colleagues always ask what Iu2019m wearing and tell me I smell so good, and my boyfriend tells me I smell so sweet and yummy. I was even in a lake with him and he told me I smelt so good. I was shocked that I smelt good even in lake water!! If you like sweeter scents I recommend you at least try the travel size!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

This is sweet and smells like a caramel covered vanilla ice cream.  I get about 6 hours out of this one, and then can still smell it against the skin.  Fantastically priced vanilla perfume.  Also great to sleep in.

reviews.review_title: Intoxicating smell, but disappears within minutes
reviews.review_text: Love it but as intoxicating as it is thereu2019s no longevity whatsoever Iu2019m quite disappointed. The smell is amazing but itu2019s so not there within 15 minutes

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love vanilla scented perfumes and this is the best one I have ever smelt. Highly recommend getting!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it does smell like vanilla bean ice cream, but for some reason i just dont like the scent. it has a strange synthetic feel to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good buy if youu2019re looking for a vanilla scent that doesnu2019t have that vanilla extract smell. Sweet, light, and complex.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is a beautiful fragrance in its own right, and because fragrances so subjective itu2019s hard to review one. BUT I donu2019t understand how people are saying the smells like vanilla ice cream. A true gourmand is sweet through and through. at first spray, the vanilla smells a little artificial, and on the dry down. All you get is the Hinoki wood. Itu2019s lovely, but I canu2019t see why this is being marketed as such a sweet scent. ufffcufffc

reviews.review_title: The only Vanilla perfume you need in life
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best perfume I've purchased in a long time. I've recently purchased it and I'm almost through my first bottle of it that's how good it is. It smells of a vanilla ice cream cone that is being melted on a warm day. I usually apply this to layer with other fragrances to add a sweetness, or I spray tons and tons of this before going to bed because I love the smell itself and love how it makes my bed smell. It isn't the strongest projecting scent but it lasts on the skin for a long time. Dulce is a must-have perfume and I will definitely be purchasing a second one soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: great scent bUT the atomizer isnu2019t that great
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Fragrance is beautiful, longevity is 4-6 hrs depending on where you spray skin/clothes etc. Giving 4 starts because after awhile the atomizer got weird and will spritz in a stream rather than evenly other than that itu2019s a bauestiful vanilla and has become my daily scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Super nice but not Ice cream

I also donu2019t get smoky, I do get a creamy powdery vanilla. The hinoki wood and chocolate gives it depth. Itu2019s a powdery super vanilla scent with depth that sits in the skin and projects. If you like that when Iu2019d say go for it. But itu2019s definitely not ice cream on me, so if you blind buy just be be mindful that it might not pull that way for you. It is very nice I would rate it a 4.5 stars if I could.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so good! Its a gourmand smell that's has sweetness and the right bit of musk to it.

reviews.review_title: Great if you like to layer scents

reviews.review_text: Honestly, I love this perfume. I love vanilla scents, but I struggle with finding ones that arenu2019t sickeningly sweet like some tend to be. As soon as I sprayed some, I got soooo excited. This scent literally smells like melted vanilla bean ice cream. Itu2019s not woodsy, floral, or spicy. It isnu2019t even too sweet or overly strong. Itu2019s just a very soothing vanilla. The only u201cproblemu201d I have with it is its lasting ability, but that factor is highly subjective, so if thatu2019s not normally an issue for you, I think you should go for it. I also think that if I pair it with some other scents, it will stay around longer. All around, itu2019s a beautiful, light scent with great, clean packaging, but if you like a u201cbusieru201d perfume than this likely wonu2019t be your style. Canu2019t wait to keep using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it, itu2019s the first new scent that I have TRULY LOVED in a long time!  Shut up and take my money!

If you love vanilla this a must have scent to add to your collection must have scent to add to your collection

reviews.review_text: I am a big fan of rosie jane, and I also love vanilla. I have used Angie and Leila Lou in the past, but when rosie put out a vanilla scent, I knew I had to try it. I love the scent. It is light and sweet. The scent also stays a bit before application. I am highly satisfied.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have nothing like this is my collection. I own all fragrances in their collection and this is tied in first place with Rosie. Easy grab and go perfume when youu2019re not sure what to wear. Long lasting and not too sweet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this company and I love their products even more. I'm very sensitive to fragrance, almost everyone I've tried has either made my skin breakout into rashes or made me sneeze constantly. Dulce By Rosie Jane has changed the perfume game for me, I can actually wear it and it doesn't make me uncomfortable. I have not had a rash at all and the scent is beautiful, very warm and woody. The vanilla stands out most when it dries down so be patient. I've been complimented by almost everyone on the scent and the silage is on point, if I spray it at night, I still smell it in the morning. This is definitely my new scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: You will not regret this purchase!

I adore it so much. I love the vanilla in it and just the overall comfort of a smell. I take it with me wherever I go. This one is a keeper!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

I pick up on some gorgeous polo santo notes which helps the fragrance not be excessively sweet. This is the best unique/sweet vanilla out there. You canu2019t forget how gorgeous and minimal the bottle looks. Overall I will keep repurchasing over the years. Iu2019m very impressed!

reviews.review_title: My new favorite fragrance by/Rosie Jane

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: By Rosie Jane does it again! Dulce dreams

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this smells super similar to the BEE perfume from ellis Brooklyn, without the spice. This is super sweet but in a nice sophisticated way. Feels like you just came out of a cookie shop along with a hug. It's my new go to every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best vanilla scent! Not artificial smelling at all. It's a very warm vanilla scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is actually for the perfume oil, which has disappeared from the site at the moment. From the description and reviews it sounded just like what I have been looking for. In reality, sadly it is not. It's alright. To me it smells similar to L'Etang Noir by Maison Louis Marie (but LML is better), which is nice...but I wanted something creamy and ice cream-like. This has a very faint chai smell, which I do like, but the scent is so soft. Overall I find it alright, but nothing wildly exciting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Got the travel spray and it smells amazing.  Very warm without being overwhelming. I have been layering this with sol de janeiro. More of a personal scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I truly love the smell of this fragrance. Itu2019s a very cozy creamy vanilla but it just does not have any lasting power. I have to drench myself with as many spritz as I typically would use with like a body spray to even smell it myself. It has a very limited sillage and sits just at the skin. So, if you prefer a perfume that is more for you to enjoy and not the others around you then this is a good choice.

reviews.review_title: It's ok. Not bad, not great.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It's ok. I was a bit disappointed with Dulce. Does it smell like a warm cozy sweet vanilla, yes. Does it smell good, yes. But that's it. Very linear. While there are slight woody touches, this is a very basic fragrance and is a step above body spray imo. I was just hoping for more depth. It does not project or last well as it sits incredibly close to the skin. I'll just be using this as a layering fragrance for when I want to add a bit of sweet vanilla, so for that purpose it does the job well. Not a bad scent, just boring. If you are looking for a basic vanilla it may be worth a sniff though.

reviews.review_title: Delicious, Rich, Warm, and Cozy Vanilla
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Dulce is a rich and cozy vanilla. On my skin, the vanilla smells more like a vanilla scent marketed as a vanilla bean, and I think that is due to the chocolate or nude musk that gives it a rich warmth to the fragrance. There is also a slight woodiness which comes from the Hinoki wood that turns into a hint of spice the longer it sits on my skin. This is not a super sweet vanilla, but it is a rich, warm, and cozy one that sits closer to the skin and one that's perfect for fall. The first time that I wore it, my husband complimented me on it and said that it reminded him of a rich and gourmand vanilla bean scent. If you prefer a sweeter vanilla, Dulce layers beautifully with Nemat Vanilla Musk oil.

reviews.review_title: The scent Iu2019ve been looking for!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So many of you might remember the very popular scents from the early 2000s called Body Fantasies. Iu2019ve been looking for a scent like their old vanilla. Found it in this! A very complex grown up yet light vanilla. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I blind bought this based on the 6 reviews on this page. The first spray smells slightly like play-dough which I think might be from the hinoki and musk combination. Unless you're smelling it up close, you don't get that slight sour touch and it just smells slightly spicy. I don't smell chocolate. Maybe a slight chocolate nuance because the vanilla smells very decadent and creamy. it's really a delicious vanilla, like the type you smell when walking by a waffle or dessert shop. it's not a love yet, just because of the sour touch, but I think I will grow to love it sooner or later. The vanilla in here reminds me of tom ford metallique without the aldehyde and a little spicy(?) touch instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It smells sweet and nostalgic like a vanilla drink from your childhood. I can mainly smell the vanilla but the chocolate and woods add a bit more depth to the scent. It's a cozy scent that wears close to the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love sweet, warm, soft scents. This sounded like it would be a great match, but there's a sharpness to it that I find very unpleasant. Maybe it's the shot of whiskey mentioned in the description. Sadly, I will be returning this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is warm vanilla sugar. Not worth the price. I get chocolate and caramel too which is nice but the artificial vanilla scent overpowers it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favourite vanilla!! For me on the dry down, it smells like a pumpkin spice vanilla latte ud83eudd0e

reviews.review_title: Sweet as they come. A MUST
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the perfume SO much. not normally a vanilla fan but Dulce has such a light, soft way about it and it actually smells like vanilla.. Love love love it.. buying the full size for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a dupe for Lira by Xerjoff. And it lasts a super long time on skin. I got a sample and I absolutely love it, it smells sweet and itu2019s perfect for fall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried almost all of the most recent vanilla fragrances and this one is by far the nicest. It is sweet but not in a cloying or artificial way, and as it dries down you get a blend of really cozy musk notes. I will be wearing this until the spring!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most perfect vanilla fall fragrance. It makes you feel so cozy on the inside but cool at the same time! I am obsessed with it.
